about-me.desc: I am an experienced developer who is enthusiastic in building interesting, beautiful, and user friendly web applications. Over the years, not only web application but I have had experience also in mobile app and server architecture. Within an organization, I am a friendly, trustworthy and effective communicator. I am looking forward to join a challenging but rewarding team to help achieving its goal.

kids4kids.desc: React website for NGO which makes positive impacts to the youth community

valuePartnerInvest.desc: React Native app for fund trading

imi.desc: Maintain and enhance an E-commerce site under Drupal framework

systemDesign.desc: Designed a system architecture and built a POC for a real time booking system, featuring Kubernetes

selfHosting.desc: Self hosting a cluster of services with only a raspberry pi (yeah raspberry pi is awesome!)

step1.title: Started as a business student
step1.description: Back in 2013, after the public exam, I was lucky enough to get enrolled into the University of Hong Kong. Being a student majoring in BBA Account & Finance, I learnt a lot about the business world.
step1.tagline: BBA, Accounting and Finance - The University of Hong Kong

step2.title: Graduate job
step2.description: Immediately after graduating from the university, I joined Credit Suisse as a back office client analyst. I was able to experience how it is like to work in a huge corporation and how to adapt to working team culture

step3.title: How my life started to relate with tech
step3.description: Principal is a great and successful company which specialize in asset management with a significant mpf market share. But since the software system was relatively old, my job requires quite a lot of excel work, and I heard something called VBA, I tried to make my work life a bit better by self learning VBA. It resulted in half of my daily work automated with just a few buttons in my control panel. I also shared it with my colleagues so that they can enjoy the success.

step4.title: The bold move
step4.description: During the time in Principal, I started to think this was not the life that I fond of (doing the same daily work for the next 30 years). I pursue something more challenge, perhaps with a bit of problem solving. Therefore, I made a bold move by quitting my job and started learning how to code. It began with writing a simple website, to a POC of a mobile game, and an inventory management system in a couple of months. It was really hard, but eventually I managed to land my first job as a developer.

step5.title: First Programmer job
step5.description: I joined Value Partners as a founding member of their brand new fund trading app project, which aims to attract younger generation to participate in the fund trading market. It was a valuable experience as I was able to take part in the entire software development lifecycle.

step6.title: Improve as a developer
step6.description: The scale of my next company is relatively small, therefore I was able to try and use a lot of different new stuff. It broaden my horizons as I worked on many different projects, including historical websites, ERP applications etc.
